helmDashboard.description: Configure specific properties to deploy helm-dashboard.

caFile.description: Path to the CA certificate to use to authenticate to the Helm repository.

certFile.description: Path to the client certificate to use to authenticate to the Helm repository.

insecure_skip_tls_verify.description: Specifies whether to skip TLS verification when connecting to the Helm repository.

keyFile.description: Path to the client key to use to authenticate to the Helm repository.

pass_credentials_all.description: Specifies whether to pass credentials to all domains.

password.description: Password to use to authenticate to the Helm repository.

username.description: Username to use to authenticate to the Helm repository.

rbac.description: Define all RBAC rules to apply on this application.

allowWriteActions.description: Specifies whether the Helm Dashboard should be allowed to perform write actions on Kubernetes (create/edit/delete).

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created.
